actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize and support the creation and dissemination of cardiomyopathy education, awareness, and risk assessment materials and resources to identify more at-risk families, to authorize research and surveillance activities relating to cardiomyopathy, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cardiomyopathy Health Education, Awareness, Research, and Training in the Schools Act of 2017

titles.title: Cardiomyopathy Health Education, Awareness, Research, and Training in the Schools Act of 2017
Cardiomyopathy Health Education, Awareness, Research, and Training in the Schools Act of 2017

To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize and support the creation and dissemination of cardiomyopathy education, awareness, and risk assessment materials and resources to identify more at-risk families, to authorize research and surveillance activities relating to cardiomyopathy, and for other purposes.
